description: In this video course you'll thoroughly get to know the most important apps on your iPad: First you will learn how to manage your address book using Contacts. Next up the Calendar lessen will enable you to schedule your daily life by setting up various calendars and events. Looking at Mail you will learn how you can setup an email account, before I will show you how to organize all of your emails e.g. by marking, moving, deleting, forwarding or replying. The Messages lesson will provide you with everything you need to send text, photos, videos and even audio messages. The Safari videos will teach you not only to navigate the web, you will learn how to manage bookmarks and read articles without internet connection. Also there is a video lesson about the Reminder app, that will teach you all about creating to-do lists, check off tasks and assign priorities. The final lesson of this course will empower you to use Siri personal assistant to send messages, set alarm clock, get weather forecast, start directions and much more the.
title: iPad Tutorial for iOS9 Part 2
